features: Dove Hair Therapy Strength and Fullness Boost is a thickening hair conditioner formulated with serum and retinol for 2X visibly fuller, thicker hair
This sulfate free conditioner is a hair strengthening treatment that strengthens hair from root to tip to instantly nourish thin, fine hair that needs special care
Use Dove Hair Therapy Strength and Fullness Boost Conditioner to nourish and soften hair from the first use
Discover Dove Hair Therapy Strength and Fullness Boost Conditioner, expert care that goes to hair's cellular level
This conditioner is formulated with potent moisturizers and nourishing ingredients
body.description: Get ready to get a 2X visibly fuller, thicker hair* because Dove Hair Therapy Strength and Fullness Boost Conditioner isn’t your typical conditioner. This hair conditioner is formulated with serum and retinol for thin, fine hair that needs special care. This hair strengthening treatment strengthens and adds fullness to your hair, wash after wash. Dove Hair Therapy Strength and Fullness is a sulfate free conditioner that features potent moisturizers and nourishing ingredients for care at the level of hair's cortex. So if you’re looking for soft, visibly nourished hair, look no further than this conditioner. While you hydrate hair with this hair thickening shampoo and conditioner system, let the potent moisturizers and nourishing ingredients restore your hair and add softness during your hair care routine from the first use. To refresh hair, apply after shampooing your hair with Dove Hair Therapy Strength and Fullness Boost Shampoo, and leave it on for a minute before rinsing. Unilever’s ongoing work on alternatives to animal testing for more than 30 years, and its commitment to promote their adoption globally, has been recognized by PETA, which has listed Unilever as “a company working for regulatory change.” Globally, Dove does not test on animals and is certified by PETA as Cruelty-Free. *system vs. flat hair *nourishes at the level of hair's cortex.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Perfect for fine hair that deserves extra care. Dove Hair Therapy Strength and Fullness Boost Shampoo and Conditioner System is designed with serum and retinol, strengthens hair from the root to tip and instantly restores hair fullness. This sulfate-free system features potent moisturizers and nourishing ingredients that deliver 2X visibly fuller, thicker hair*. *System vs. flat hair.

Cellular Level Hair Care Thickening sulfate-free Shampoo and Conditioner system with serum and retinol. For thin, fine hair that needs special care. The Dove Difference From the beginning, Dove has drawn inspiration from real, diverse women and celebrates real beauty, which it defines as feeling and looking your best. Dove Hair Therapy Dove Hair Therapy extends premium hair care range with potent ingredients that nourish hair at a cellular level for 100% smoother hair after the first use. Real Beauty Is Cruelty-Free Dove care goes beyond just your hair. This hair mist is the perfect addition to your Cruelty-Free beauty collection – just check out our PETA-logo.

Dove Hair Therapy Strength & Fullness Conditioner Dove Hair Therapy Rescue & Protect Shampoo Dove Hair Therapy Rescue & Protect Conditioner + Serum Main Benefit This Conditioner strengthens hair from root to tip instantly restoring hair fullness. This sulfate-free formula is perfect for visibly damaged and over-processed hair, this shampoo strengthens internal hair bonds, seals split ends and protects from heat damage. This rinse-off serum + conditioner has the nourishment of a conditioner combined with the potency of a serum in one step to seal split ends and protect in 1 minute.

reviews.reviewText: Smells amazing does the job wonderfully and only needs a little bit goes a long way got to love that dove.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does not work as product claims.
reviews.reviewText: First off I only use Dove products. Being a loyal Dove user, I had such high hopes for this shampoo and conditioner. I have thin hair due to a thyroid disease. I was looking for a shampoo and conditioner that would boost my volume and condition at the same time. Unfortunately, the product does not work for the appearance of thinning hair and I didn't see any real changes in volume. The smell is a bit off and it does not do a good job conditioning. It also takes three pumps of product to get my hair into a lather. The condition is not good. It leaves your hair feeling dry and full of tangles. Overall I would not recommend this Dove product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the best conditioner that I have ever tried. It is luxurious and so moisturizing. The first time I used this conditioner, it felt so good that I wanted to fill the bathtub up with this and soak my whole body in it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had a problem with my hair breaking when I shampooed or brushed it. After getting dove shampoo I noticed no more hair in the sink even on the first usage
